description: This file contains Pydantic schema definitions for API request and response models related to connectors and OAuth workflows in the project.

classes.name: ConnectorResponse
classes.description: Response model for connector information, including details like ID, key, name, schema, OAuth support, and creation time.

classes.name: ConnectionCreate
classes.description: Request model for creating a new connection, including connector key and optional configuration data.

classes.name: ConnectionUpdate
classes.description: Request model for updating an existing connection, allowing modification of configuration and status.

classes.name: ConnectionResponse
classes.description: Response model for connection details, including ID, user and connector IDs, configuration, status, timestamps, and OAuth token presence.

classes.name: OAuthAuthorizeResponse
classes.description: Response model for initiating OAuth authorization, providing URL and state token.

classes.name: OAuthCallbackRequest
classes.description: Request model for handling OAuth callback, including authorization code, state, and optional connection ID.

classes.name: OAuthCallbackResponse
classes.description: Response model for OAuth callback completion, indicating success, message, and optional connection ID.

classes.name: ErrorResponse
classes.description: Standard model for representing error details and optional error codes.

ctags.name: Config
ctags.pattern: /^    class Config:$/

ctags.name: Config
ctags.pattern: /^    class Config:$/

ctags.name: ConnectionCreate
ctags.pattern: /^class ConnectionCreate(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: ConnectionResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class ConnectionResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: ConnectionUpdate
ctags.pattern: /^class ConnectionUpdate(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: ConnectorResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class ConnectorResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: ErrorResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class ErrorResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: OAuthAuthorizeResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class OAuthAuthorizeResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: OAuthCallbackRequest
ctags.pattern: /^class OAuthCallbackRequest(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: OAuthCallbackResponse
ctags.pattern: /^class OAuthCallbackResponse(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: authorization_url
ctags.pattern: /^    authorization_url: str = Field(..., description="URL to redirect the user for OAuth")$/

ctags.name: code
ctags.pattern: /^    code: str = Field(..., description="Authorization code from provider")$/

ctags.name: config_data
ctags.pattern: /^    config_data: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = Field(None, description="Connector configuration dat/

ctags.name: config_data
ctags.pattern: /^    config_data: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = Field(None, description="Connector configuration dat/

ctags.name: config_data
ctags.pattern: /^    config_data: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = Field(None, description="Saved connector configurati/

ctags.name: config_schema
ctags.pattern: /^    config_schema: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = Field(None, description="JSON schema for connector/

ctags.name: connection_id
ctags.pattern: /^    connection_id: Optional[int] = Field(None, description="Connection ID if tokens were stored"/

ctags.name: connection_id
ctags.pattern: /^    connection_id: Optional[int] = Field(None, description="Optional connection to attach tokens/

ctags.name: connector
ctags.pattern: /^    connector: ConnectorResponse = Field(..., description="Connector details")$/

ctags.name: connector_id
ctags.pattern: /^    connector_id: int = Field(..., description="Associated connector ID")$/

ctags.name: connector_key
ctags.pattern: /^    connector_key: str = Field(..., description="Connector key identifier")$/

ctags.name: created_at
ctags.pattern: /^    created_at: datetime = Field(..., description="Creation timestamp")$/

ctags.name: created_at
ctags.pattern: /^    created_at: datetime = Field(..., description="Creation timestamp")$/

ctags.name: detail
ctags.pattern: /^    detail: str = Field(..., description="Error detail message")$/

ctags.name: error_code
ctags.pattern: /^    error_code: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Optional machine-readable error code")$/

ctags.name: from_attributes
ctags.pattern: /^        from_attributes = True$/

ctags.name: from_attributes
ctags.pattern: /^        from_attributes = True$/

ctags.name: has_oauth_token
ctags.pattern: /^    has_oauth_token: bool = Field(default=False, description="Whether an OAuth token is stored f/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: int = Field(..., description="Connection ID")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: int = Field(..., description="Connector ID")$/

ctags.name: key
ctags.pattern: /^    key: str = Field(..., description="Connector unique key")$/

ctags.name: message
ctags.pattern: /^    message: str = Field(..., description="Human-readable status message")$/

ctags.name: name
ctags.pattern: /^    name: str = Field(..., description="Connector display name")$/

ctags.name: oauth_scopes
ctags.pattern: /^    oauth_scopes: List[str] = Field(default_factory=list, description="List of OAuth scopes requ/

ctags.name: state
ctags.pattern: /^    state: str = Field(..., description="Signed state token for OAuth CSRF protection")$/

ctags.name: state
ctags.pattern: /^    state: str = Field(..., description="State token returned by provider")$/

ctags.name: status
ctags.pattern: /^    status: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Connection status")$/

ctags.name: status
ctags.pattern: /^    status: str = Field(..., description="Connection status")$/

ctags.name: success
ctags.pattern: /^    success: bool = Field(..., description="Whether the OAuth process succeeded")$/

ctags.name: supports_oauth
ctags.pattern: /^    supports_oauth: bool = Field(..., description="Whether the connector supports OAuth")$/

ctags.name: user_id
ctags.pattern: /^    user_id: int = Field(..., description="Owner user ID")$/
